text: Helianthus membranifolius is a species of sunflower in the daisy family. It is native to Cayenne Island in French Guiana, part of the French Republic.Poiret, Jean Louis Marie 1813. Encyclopédie méthodique, botanique Supplément 3: 18 diagnosis in Latin, description + commentary in FrenchTropicos, Helianthus membranifolius Poir. ==References== membranifolius Category:Flora of French Guiana Category:Plants described in 1813
title: Helianthus membranifolius
